©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
17
• The linguistic model should allow for:
– Addition of multilingual data to any element of the ontology
– Selection of the ontology element (class, property, instance, etc.) the user 
wants to be multilingual
Linking the OntologyElement
class (from the OWL Ontology 
Meta-model) to the Linguistic 
Information Repository
HOW?
LIR – Linguistic Information Repository
speaker: SYSTEM
